product_description: THRIVE 6 Grain Pancake Mix; There are two unit sizes:  (1) 4 lb. #10/gallon can (6.03x 7.02) (the "Gallon Cans"); and  (2)  1.17 lb. Pull-Top Pantry Cans (4.01x 5.08) (the "Pantry Cans").    Both units are packaged in metal cans. The Pantry Can has a metal pull-top lid and the Gallon Can has a metal lid that must be opened by a can opener. (1) The Gallon Cans may be ordered as single units or in six (6) can cases. (2)  The Pantry Cans may be ordered as single units or in ten (10) can  cases.
product_quantity: Gallon Cans - 100,116 cans; Pantry Cans -  4,219 cans
reason_for_recall: Thrive Foods is recalling certain lots of its 64 and 72 ounce cans of THRIVE 6 Grain Pancake Mix because this product contains ingredients that react over time and increase the pressure inside the can, which may cause cans to expand or bulge and increase the risk of sudden release of the pancake mix when the can is opened and could pose the risk of injury.

reason_for_recall: Greek yogurt product Chobani brand is recalled due to report of illnesses and product bloated and swollen.
code_info: Sep 11-13 (four didit time stamp) to Oct 07-13 (four digit time stamp) 16-012.  This code is interpreted as Best By dates September 11, 2013 through October 07, 2013; 16-012 is the IMS number of a production plant in Twin Falls, Idaho.
